Title: Fantomas vs. Scotland Yard
Writer: Pierre Souvestre (novels), Marcel Allain (novels), Jean Halain (adaptation), Pierre Foucaud (adaptation)
Actors: Jean Marais, Louis de Funès, Mylène Demongeot, Françoise Christophe
Plot: Fantomas wants to collect money from scottish rich' for letting them live. The French inspector (Louis de Funes) comes to a scottish castle to protect the owner, and to catch Fantomas. ...
